title: Person Of Interest: John Reese's Theme
author: Gearstothewall513
comment: John Reese deserves so much more. I miss this show

Harold: (watches Reese pull out the sniper rifle from the trunk) Mr. Reese...I'm very uncomfortable being here. 

Reese: (hands Finch a Scope) I'm very uncomfortable having you here, Finch. But I need a spotter. (Takes aim at car).
John Reese is my favorite. Not John Wick. Not 007. Not Batman. Don’t care how popular they are.
God this was so badass when this plays and he blows up his first car of the show with his grenade launcher and gas mask

0:55 The bowels of hell have opened and John Reese has emerged. I've heard of reluctant messiahs, but Reese was a reluctant satan. He was inherently good at doing very bad things. He once said, "Maybe good people need me to do the things they can't."  When was the last time you heard the Knock Knock theme? Major mistake by producers to reduce Reese's screen time.
description: i know the actually original title of the normal track is knock knock. but i always refer to it as the official john reese theme because whenever something he does thats major is bad-ass this track always. like his action theme if you will lol.
